scenario.output:
Снова призываю Духа-Сказителя...
Начало истории (на языке Духа): In the arcane workshop, the technomancer leaned over the glowing terminal...

...Дух-Сказитель, поняв нас, продолжает:
In the arcane workshop, the technomancer leaned over the glowing terminal, his fingers dancing across the keys. Ancient runes flickered to life on the screen, summoning spirits from the digital ether. The air hummed with magic as a portal to new worlds began to open.
